Articles.Content:
i have an ryzon rx 590 fat-boy (full build https://pcpartpicker.com/list/mm7zRJ )
my game-data has  a few visual mods like svt and scatter, when i run ksp while flying in the atmosphere my GPU usage boosts up to 99% but my specs should be able to run this.
so my first question is, should i be worried if my GPU usages boosts up to 100%
and my second, is there a fix to this?
